project_descr: This project aims to enhance capacity of the Special Investigation Unit (SIU) at the Public Prosecutor's Office to perform its role and assume its responsibilities in an efficient manner and according to international standards.

outputs.output_descr: Strengthening structure and capacity of the Public Prosecution to comply with the BICI recommendations & improving Case Management systems and Communication Plans at the SIU.
outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management

project_title: strengthening capacity of special investigation unit
